Uses of Class
io.hekate.failover.FailoverPolicyBuilder

  • Packages that use FailoverPolicyBuilder 
    Package Description
    io.hekate.failover
    Failover API.
    io.hekate.messaging
    MessagingService API.
    io.hekate.rpc
    RpcService API.

    • Uses of FailoverPolicyBuilder in io.hekate.failover

      Methods in io.hekate.failover that return FailoverPolicyBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FailoverPolicyBuilder FailoverPolicyBuilder.withAlwaysReRoute()
      Applies FailoverRoutingPolicy.RE_ROUTE policy to this builder.
      FailoverPolicyBuilder FailoverPolicyBuilder.withAlwaysRetrySameNode()
      Applies FailoverRoutingPolicy.RETRY_SAME_NODE policy to this builder.
      FailoverPolicyBuilder FailoverPolicyBuilder.withConstantRetryDelay(long delay)
      Shortcut method to apply ConstantFailoverDelay to this builder.
      FailoverPolicyBuilder FailoverPolicyBuilder.withErrorTypes(Class<? extends Throwable>... errorTypes)
      Fluent-style version of setErrorTypes(List).
      FailoverPolicyBuilder FailoverPolicyBuilder.withErrorTypes(Class<? extends Throwable> errorType)
      Fluent-style version of setErrorTypes(List).
      FailoverPolicyBuilder FailoverPolicyBuilder.withMaxAttempts(int attempts)
      Shortcut method to setRetryUntil(List) register} a MaxFailoverAttempts condition to this builder.
      FailoverPolicyBuilder FailoverPolicyBuilder.withRetryDelay(FailoverDelaySupplier retryDelay)
      Fluent-style version of setRetryDelay(FailoverDelaySupplier).
      FailoverPolicyBuilder FailoverPolicyBuilder.withRetrySameNodeIfExists()
      Applies FailoverRoutingPolicy.PREFER_SAME_NODE policy to this builder.
      FailoverPolicyBuilder FailoverPolicyBuilder.withRetryUntil(FailoverCondition retryUntil)
      Fluent style version of setRetryUntil(List).

    • Uses of FailoverPolicyBuilder in io.hekate.messaging

      Methods in io.hekate.messaging with parameters of type FailoverPolicyBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessagingChannel<T> MessagingChannel.withFailover(FailoverPolicyBuilder policy)
      Returns a copy of this channel that will use the specified failover policy and will inherit all other options from this instance.

    • Uses of FailoverPolicyBuilder in io.hekate.rpc

      Methods in io.hekate.rpc with parameters of type FailoverPolicyBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RpcClientBuilder<T> RpcClientBuilder.withFailover(FailoverPolicyBuilder policy)
      Returns a new builder that will apply the specifier failover policy to all of the clients that it will produce.
